name: Tyrant of the Otherworld Prison: My Shadow Can Evolve Infinitely
author: 萌月文化
content: In the year 2035, rifts to alien realms tore through the world’s defenses. Swarms of insectoids and beastkin ravaged the land, and humanity struggled to survive through the strength of “Evolvers.” Li Yi was betrayed by his teammates during an attack by alien beings and left for dead. On the brink of death, he awakened the “Titan Shadow” System—his shadow could evolve without limits!
